src:
M Taufik Gerindra Protes Waduk Pondok Ranggon Mangkrak 4 Tahun
05 Nov 2019, 15:16 by Eva Safitri
Jakarta - Wakil Ketua DPRD DKI Jakarta dari Fraksi Gerindra, M Taufik, kesal waduk proyek Pondok Ranggon mangkrak 4 tahun. Dia mempertanyakan apa alasan proyek waduk tersebut mangkrak.
Hal itu diungkapkan dalam rapat membahas anggaran Kebijakan Umum Anggaran-Prioritas Plafon Anggaran Sementara (KUA-PPAS) 2020 bersama Dinas Sumber Daya Air (SDA), di ruang rapat komisi D, lantai 1, gedung DPRD, Jakarta Pusat, Selasa (4/11/2019).
Awalnya, Taufik menyoroti anggaran pembangunan waduk sebesar Rp 288 miliar untuk tiga lokasi, yakni Waduk di wilayah Sunter Selatan, Kampung Rambutan dan Cimanggis. M Taufik mempertanyakan waduk di Pondok Ranggon, yang disebutnya berada di depan rumahnya, tak masuk anggaran.
"Kenapa bapak nggak cantumin untuk Pondok Ranggon? Kenapa itu ? Argumennya apa Pondok Ranggon yang sudah 3-4 tahun mangkrak? Saya mau nuntut, ini 4 tahun apa argumennya? Kalau (alasannya) di situ nggak ada aliran sungai, ada. (Sungai) Sentiong," ujar Taufik, dalam rapat.
text:
M Taufik Gerindra Protests Pondok Ranggon Mangkrak Reservoir 4 Years
05 Nov 2019, 15:16 by Eva Safitri
Jakarta - Deputy Chairperson of DKI Jakarta DPRD from the Gerindra Faction, M Taufik, was upset about the Pondok Ranggon reservoir project being stalled for 4 years. He questioned the reason why the dam project was stalled.
This was revealed in a meeting discussing the budget of the 2020 General Policy of Priority Budget Ceiling (KUA-PPAS) together with the Water Resources Office (SDA), in the Commission D meeting room, 1st floor, DPRD building, Central Jakarta, Tuesday (11/4) / 2019).
Initially, Taufik highlighted the reservoir construction budget of Rp 288 billion for three locations, namely Reservoirs in the South Sunter region, Kampung Rambutan and Cimanggis. M Taufik questioned the reservoir in Pondok Ranggon, which he said was in front of his house, not included in the budget.
"Why don't you think about Pondok Ranggon? Why is that? The argument is Pondok Ranggon, which has been stalled for 3-4 years? I want to sue, what is the 4-year argument? If (the reason) there is no river flow, there is. (River) Sentiong, "said Taufik, in a meeting.
